Package net.tvburger.jdl

package net.tvburger.jdl
Welcome to Java Deep Learning! Here you can find implementation of machine learning concepts in java for learning more about Machine Learning.
Author:
Tom Burger
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
    Provides the implementation of Bernard Widrow and Ted Hoff's ADALINE (1960)
    net.tvburger.jdl.common
    Contains classes that are common (can be used well outside the scope of machine learning / AI)
    net.tvburger.jdl.datasets
    Package to obtain data sets to be used with estimation functions
    net.tvburger.jdl.knn
    Provides the implementation of k-Nearest Neighbors
    net.tvburger.jdl.mlp
    Implementation of the MultiLayer Perceptron [WIP]
    net.tvburger.jdl.model
    Defines the concepts for estimation functions
    net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron
    Provides the implementation of Frank Rosenblatt's Perceptron (1958)
